scripts.dev:
helm delete redis || true && helm install redis -f values.yaml oci://registry-1.docker.io/bitnamicharts/redis && echo "
Sleeping for one minute, to allow the three instances of redis to startup...
" && sleep 60 && kubectl delete deployment test-app || true && kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml
scripts.startcount: kubectl exec -it $(kubectl get pod -l app=test-app -o jsonpath="{.items[0].metadata.name}") -- curl localhost:3000/start
scripts.stopcount: kubectl exec -it $(kubectl get pod -l app=test-app -o jsonpath="{.items[0].metadata.name}") -- curl localhost:3000/stop
scripts.check: kubectl exec -it $(kubectl get pod -l app=test-app -o jsonpath="{.items[0].metadata.name}") -- curl localhost:3000/check
scripts.getmaster: kubectl exec -it redis-node-0 --container sentinel -- redis-cli -p 26379 sentinel get-master-addr-by-name mymaster | grep -o "redis-node-[0-9]" | tr -d ''
scripts.killmaster: kubectl exec -it $(npm run -s getmaster) --container redis -- redis-cli shutdown
scripts.push: docker build -t massiricci/testimg:latest . && docker push massiricci/testimg:latest && kubectl delete deployment test-app && kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml
